title: I'm a 14-year-old female and the highest note I've been able to hit is E6 and the deepest G3. I can hit both notes but they are a bit shaky. How do I improve my singing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Forget a little about hitting notes: those notes sound “shaky” because they’re too extreme for you and that’s completely okay. Now you should get a good teacher, they’ll be able to guide you properly. Meanwhile, please stop trying to push boundaries without proper training, it’s really easy to do something wrong and get vocal damage, even permanent ones. Just try to sing songs that you like and search for what you’re best at, only sing if it’s comfortable for you, but getting some lessons are really important to advance.
